name: The Path of the Alchemist - BETA 2
name_original: The Path of the Alchemist - BETA 2
description:
The Path of the Alchemist is a rogue-like 2D where the main character is Nico, a young alchemist that wants to craft the 'elixir of life' to cure his little sister. Nico has to go to dangerous dungeons where he will fight monsters and find new recipes to craft to become a great alchemist. Would he find the elixir he is looking for?

Game Controls:

Keys / Buttons (for Gamepad)

What to do

WASD or Arrows / D-pad

Movement

X / East Button

Interactuate

Space / South Button

Attack

O / North Button

Use equipped object

I / L button

Change selected object

P / R button

Parry

J / West Button

Roll

Escape / Select

Pause

Ctrl / Start

Inventory

Please, if you can take 5 mins to do this form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeAGnGFs8cchMzZyDQpubY1pi3ZcHCkmxUkceb9...
